entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
